tokenColors.name: Constantes — Built-in (true · false · null · nil · None · undefined)

Operadores — Matemáticos, lógicos e de comparação
Funções — SQL Window (ROW_NUMBER · RANK · OVER · PARTITION BY)

Variáveis — Propriedades e membros de objeto
PHP 8 — Union types e intersection types (string|int · A&B)
PHP — Tags de abertura e fechamento (<?php · <?= · ?>)
PHP — Variável dentro de string dupla ("Olá $nome")
Vue.js — Directives (v-bind · v-on · v-if · v-for · v-model)

SQL — DML (SELECT · INSERT · UPDATE · DELETE · MERGE)
SQL — DDL destrutivo (CREATE · ALTER · DROP · TRUNCATE · GRANT)
SQL — Cláusulas (FROM · WHERE · JOIN · GROUP BY · HAVING · ORDER BY · LIMIT)
SQL — CASE / WHEN / THEN / ELSE / END
SQL — Tipos de dados (INT · VARCHAR · DATE · BOOLEAN · DECIMAL)
SQL — Funções built-in (COUNT · SUM · COALESCE · CAST · UPPER)
SQL — Window functions (ROW_NUMBER · RANK · OVER · PARTITION BY)
SQL — Constraints (PRIMARY KEY · FOREIGN KEY · INDEX · UNIQUE)
